MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#421-437) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#433-435)
markdown:
[MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L421-L437) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L433-L435)

description:
CompoundManager.closeLoan(address,bytes32) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#129-155) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#144)

CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(address,address,address) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#462-468) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 && debt == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#465)
markdown:
[CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(address,address,address)](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L462-L468) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [collateral == 0 && debt == 0](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L465)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[_wallet].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery)

description:
Reentrancy in MakerV2Loan.giveVault(address,bytes32) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#294-306):
	External calls:
	- cdpManager.give(uint256(_loanId),msg.sender) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#304)
	- onlyNewVersion() (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#300)
		- (success,res) = msg.sender.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(isNewVersion(address),address(this))) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#92)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- clearLoanOwner(_wallet,_loanId) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#305)
		- delete loanIds[_wallet][cdpManager.ilks(uint256(_loanId))] (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#330)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MakerV2Loan.giveVault(address,bytes32)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L294-L306):
	External calls:
	- [cdpManager.give(uint256(_loanId),msg.sender)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L304)
	- [onlyNewVersion()](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L300)
		- [(success,res) = msg.sender.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(isNewVersion(address),address(this)))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L92)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [clearLoanOwner(_wallet,_loanId)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L305)
		- [delete loanIds[_wallet][cdpManager.ilks(uint256(_loanId))]](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L330)

description:
Reentrancy in MakerV2Loan.openVault(address,address,uint256,uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#469-497):
	External calls:
	- _cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#487)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- loanIds[_wallet][ilk] = bytes32(_cdpId) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#489)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MakerV2Loan.openVault(address,address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L469-L497):
	External calls:
	- [_cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L487)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [loanIds[_wallet][ilk] = bytes32(_cdpId)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L489)

description: BaseFeature.recoverToken(address) (modules/common/BaseFeature.sol#99-102) ignores return value by _token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(ERC20(_token).transfer.selector,address(versionManager),total)) (modules/common/BaseFeature.sol#101)

VersionManager.recoverToken(address) (modules/VersionManager.sol#101-104) ignores return value by _token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(ERC20(_token).transfer.selector,msg.sender,total)) (modules/VersionManager.sol#103)
RelayerManager.execute(address,address,bytes,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,address,address).stack (modules/RelayerManager/RelayerManager.sol#113) is a local variable never initialized
markdown: [RelayerManager.execute(address,address,bytes,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,address,address).stack](contracts/modules/RelayerManager/RelayerManager.sol#L113) is a local variable never initialized

description: MakerV2Loan.joinCollateral(address,uint256,uint256,bytes32) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#344-369) ignores return value by collateral.approve(address(gemJoin),_collateralAmount) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#366)

BaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes) (wallet/BaseWallet.sol#117-128) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success,_result) = _target.call{value: _value}(_data) (wallet/BaseWallet.sol#119)
markdown:
[BaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/wallet/BaseWallet.sol#L117-L128) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:

description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Proxy (wallet/Proxy.sol#25-51) has payable functions:
	 - Proxy.fallback() (wallet/Proxy.sol#35-46)
	 - Proxy.receive() (wallet/Proxy.sol#48-50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Proxy](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L25-L51) has payable functions:
	 - [Proxy.fallback()](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L35-L46)
	 - [Proxy.receive()](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L48-L50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
